text: Ye sakala marubasi pichane raye geche [1] tara to apanake balabe, ‘amadera dhana-sampada o paribara-parijana amaderake byasta rekheche, ata'eba, amadera jan'ya ksamaprarthana karuna. Tara mukhe ta bale ya tadera antare ne'i. Taderake baluna, ‘allah‌ karo kono ksati kimba mangala sadhanera icche karale ke allahara mokabilaya tomadera jan'ya kono kichura malika habe? Bastuta tomara ya kara se bisaye allah‌ samyaka abahita.’
